targets.query: SELECT percentile("duration", 95) FROM rails_transactions WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'
SELECT percentile("sql_duration", 95) FROM rails_transactions WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'
SELECT mean("duration_95th") AS "95th Percentile" FROM rails_transactions WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'
SELECT percentile("cache_duration", 95) FROM rails_transactions WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'
SELECT (sum(cache_read_hit_count) / (sum(cache_read_hit_count) + sum(cache_read_miss_count))) * 100 FROM rails_transactions WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'

SELECT "duration_95th" AS "95th Percentile", "duration_99th" AS "99th Percentile", "duration_mean" AS "Mean" FROM downsampled.grape_transaction_timings_per_action WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'

SELECT "sql_duration_95th" AS "95th Percentile", "sql_duration_99th" AS "99th Percentile", "sql_duration_mean" AS "Mean", "sql_duration_max" AS "Maximum" FROM downsampled.grape_transaction_timings_per_action WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'

SELECT "cache_duration_95th" AS "95th Percentile", "cache_duration_99th" AS "99th Percentile", "cache_duration_mean" AS "Mean" FROM downsampled.grape_transaction_timings_per_action WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'
SELECT "duration_95th" AS "95th Percentile", "duration_99th" AS "99th Percentile", "duration_mean" AS "Mean" FROM downsampled.grape_git_timings_per_action WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'

SELECT "sql_count_95th" AS "95th Percentile", "sql_count_99th" AS "99th Percentile", "sql_count_mean" AS "Mean", "sql_count_max" AS "Maximum" FROM downsampled.grape_transaction_sql_counts_per_action WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'
SELECT "cache_read_hit_count_mean" AS "Hit mean", "cache_read_miss_count_mean" AS "Miss mean" FROM downsampled.grape_transaction_cache_counts_per_action WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'

SELECT "new_redis_connections_95th" AS "95th Percentile", "new_redis_connections_99th" AS "99th Percentile", "new_redis_connections_mean" AS "Mean", "new_redis_connections_max" AS "Maximum" FROM downsampled.grape_transaction_new_redis_connection_counts_per_action WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action'
SELECT mean("duration_95th") FROM downsampled.grape_method_call_timings_per_action_and_method WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action' GROUP BY "method", time($interval)
SELECT mean("cpu_duration_95th") FROM downsampled.grape_method_call_timings_per_action_and_method WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action' GROUP BY "method", time($interval)
SELECT mean("call_count_95th") FROM downsampled.grape_method_call_timings_per_action_and_method WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action' GROUP BY "method", time($interval)

SELECT "duration" AS "Duration", "allocated_memory" AS "Memory", "request_method" AS "Method", "action" AS "Action", "request_uri" AS "URI" FROM "rails_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter AND "action" = '$action' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 100

list.label: Action
list.name: action
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM downsampled.grape_transaction_counts_per_action WITH KEY = "action"
